Merge Tales

Brief: Embark on a whimsical journey in Merge Tales, where a secret world of enchantment awaits you. Dive into a realm where you can live out your sweetest childhood fantasies, meet characters spun from tales of magic, and engage in strategic puzzle-solving. Every move in Merge Tales can bring new wonders to discover and delightful friends to your blossoming homestead.
